english: There is nothing to tell
He is just some guy I work with

chinese: 少來了  你們都在約會了
english: C'mon, you're going out with the guy!

chinese: 這個男人一定有什麼問題
english: There is gotta be something wrong with him

chinese: 他是駝背嗎  戴着假髮的駝背
english: So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?
Wait does he eat chalk
Just, 'cause, I don't want her to go through
what I went through with Carl

chinese: 拜託各位  放鬆點  這甚至不算是約會
english: Okay everybody relax. This is not even a date.

chinese: 只不過是兩個人出去喫個飯
english: It is just two people going out to dinner
and not having sex
Sounds like a date to me

chinese: 於是我回到了高中學校
english: All right, so I'm back in high school,
I'm standing in the middle of the cafeteria

chinese: 然後發現自己全身赤裸
english: and I realize I am totally naked
Oh, yeah. Had that dream.

chinese: 然後我低下頭  看見那裏有一部
english: Then I look down and I realize there is a phone
there
- Instead of...?  - That's right.
- Never had that dream. - No.

chinese: 突然  那電話響起來了
english: All of a sudden the phone starts to ring
And it turns out it's my mother
which is very-very weird because-

chinese: 因爲她從來不打電話給我
english: she never calls me
Hi

chinese: 這傢伙一張嘴打招呼  我就想自殺
english: This guy says hello I wanna kill myself
You okay sweetie?

chinese: 我感覺有人把手伸入我的喉嚨
english: I just feel like someone reached down my throat
grabbed my small intestine
pulled it out of my mouth
and tied it around my neck
Cookie

chinese: 卡羅爾今天把她的東西搬走了
english: Carol moved her stuff out today
Let me get you some coffee

chinese: 不  不要  別再淨化我的靈氣了
english: No, no don't! Stop cleansing my aura!

chinese: 巴瑞真的超像薯頭先生
english: how much Barry looks like  Potato Head

chinese: 不管怎麼說 我必須離開那裏
english: Anyway I just had to get out of there
and I started wondering

chinese: 而且我知道我們有點疏遠了
english: and I know that you and I have kinda drifted apart,
who lived here in the city

chinese: 可是對我來說就有關係
english: Well it matters to me
